tooltip.relics.umbrella.description: Softens the fall, ensuring a safe landing from any height. With skillful use, it can serve as a reliable shield, keeping enemies at bay.
tooltip.relics.umbrella.ability.glider.d: When holding the umbrella in hand, it gradually slows the player's fall and reduces damage based on the falling speed. The slower the fall, the greater the damage reduction, up to complete negation.
tooltip.relics.umbrella.ability.shield.d: When used, it acts as a shield, knocking back targets.
tooltip.relics.plastic_drinking_hat.desc: Speeds up the drinking process, helping to not only quickly quench thirst but also surprisingly restore hunger.
tooltip.relics.plastic_drinking_hat.abil: When consuming a liquid, it also restores the player's hunger.
tooltip.relics.novelty_drinking_hat.desc: Speeds up the drinking process, helping to not only quickly quench thirst but also surprisingly restore hunger.
tooltip.relics.novelty_drinking_hat.abil: When consuming a liquid, it also restores the player's hunger.
tooltip.relics.snorkel.description: Allows for longer underwater exploration without the risk of drowning.
tooltip.relics.snorkel.ability.diving.de: Applies a temporary water breathing effect when fully submerged.
tooltip.relics.villager_hat.description: Reduces prices when trading with villagers, making trades more profitable.
tooltip.relics.villager_hat.ability.disc: Increases the discount when trading with villagers.
tooltip.relics.superstitious_hat.descrip: Increases loot drops from killed mobs.
tooltip.relics.superstitious_hat.ability: Has a chance to apply an additional level of looting to killed mobs. If successful, the ability triggers again, adding another level of looting. The process continues until the chance fails, summing all the levels.
tooltip.relics.anglers_hat.ability.catch: Has a chance to increase the amount of catch received. If successful, the ability triggers again, adding even more catch. The process continues until the chance fails, summing all the catch.
tooltip.relics.lucky_scarf.description: Increases the luck level when mining blocks.
Has a chance to apply an additional level of luck to mined blocks. If successful, the ability triggers again, adding another level of luck. The process continues until the chance fails, summing all the levels.
tooltip.relics.scarf_of_invisibility.des: Makes the player invisible to others when moving cautiously.
tooltip.relics.scarf_of_invisibility.abi: If the player's movement speed falls below a threshold, they gain an invisibility effect. Interacting with objects in the world creates an area where invisibility no longer applies until the player exits the area.
tooltip.relics.flame_pendant.description: Incinerates anyone who dares to attack the relic bearer.
tooltip.relics.flame_pendant.ability.fir: Has a chance to ignite the target that attacked the player.
tooltip.relics.shock_pendant.description: Strikes anyone with lightning who dares to attack the relic bearer.
tooltip.relics.shock_pendant.ability.lig: Has a chance to strike the target that attacked the player with lightning.
tooltip.relics.thorn_pendant.description: Poisons anyone who dares to attack the relic bearer.
tooltip.relics.thorn_pendant.ability.poi: Has a chance to reflect part of the damage and apply poison to the target that attacked the player.
tooltip.relics.cowboy_hat.description: Increases the agility of the relic owner's riding animals.
tooltip.relics.cowboy_hat.ability.cowboy: Increases movement speed on riding animals.
tooltip.relics.crystal_heart.description: Grants the relic owner additional strength, increasing their maximum health.
tooltip.relics.crystal_heart.ability.hea: Increases the player's maximum health (base health is 20 units).
tooltip.relics.universal_attractor.descr: Manipulates a weak magnetic field around the relic owner, controlling the gravity of nearby items.
tooltip.relics.universal_attractor.abili: Toggleable ability with 2 modes: attraction and repulsion. In attraction mode, it pulls nearby items towards the player. In repulsion mode, it pushes them away.
tooltip.relics.cross_necklace.descriptio: Envelops the relic owner with a protective aura, granting temporary invulnerability after each hit taken.
tooltip.relics.cross_necklace.ability.in: Increases the duration of invulnerability after taking damage (base duration is 1 second).
tooltip.relics.night_vision_goggles.desc: Allows the relic holder to see more clearly in the dark.
tooltip.relics.night_vision_goggles.abil: Increases the brightness of poorly lit areas.
tooltip.relics.cloud_in_a_bottle.descrip: Improves the relic holder's maneuverability, allowing for additional jumps in the air.
tooltip.relics.cloud_in_a_bottle.ability: Allows additional jumps in the air.
tooltip.relics.vampiric_glove.descriptio: Grants the relic holder's attacks a vampiric effect, healing them for a portion of the damage dealt.
tooltip.relics.vampiric_glove.ability.va: Heals the player for a portion of the damage they deal.
tooltip.relics.golden_hook.description: Allows the relic holder to make precise attacks, retaining more experience from killing mobs.
Increases the amount of experience gained from killing mobs.
tooltip.relics.onion_ring.description: Increases the efficiency of block mining for the relic holder when their hunger level is sufficiently high.
Increases mining speed based on the player's hunger.
tooltip.relics.digging_claws.description: Strengthens the relic holder's hands, allowing for more efficient block breaking.
tooltip.relics.feral_claws.description: Awakens the bloodlust within the relic holder, causing them to attack faster with each subsequent strike.
tooltip.relics.feral_claws.ability.claws: Increases attack speed with each subsequent attack made within 3 seconds of the last. If no attack is made within this time, one charge is lost per second. Attacking with an unfilled attack speed bar will reset the accumulated charges.
tooltip.relics.antidote_vessel.descripti: Enhances the relic holder's resistance to negative effects.
tooltip.relics.antidote_vessel.ability.a: Reduces the duration of negative effects.
tooltip.relics.power_glove.description: Allows the relic holder to deliver powerful attacks.
tooltip.relics.power_glove.ability.power: Increases damage dealt by the player, but goes on a 5-second cooldown after each attack.
tooltip.relics.withered_bracelet.descrip: Fills the relic holder's weapon with withering energy, affecting all it touches.
tooltip.relics.withered_bracelet.ability: Has a chance to apply the Wither effect to the attacked target for 5 seconds.
tooltip.relics.snowshoes.description: Increases the mobility of the relic's wearer in harsh snowy conditions.
tooltip.relics.snowshoes.ability.speed.d: Increases movement speed on snow. Allows for easy movement in loose snow
tooltip.relics.steadfast_spikes.descript: Firmly anchors the relic's wearer's feet to any surface.
Increases resistance to knockback and slippery blocks.
tooltip.relics.rooted_boots.description: Grants the relic's wearer the secret power of a sheep.
tooltip.relics.rooted_boots.ability.devo: Periodically turns grass blocks underfoot into dirt, restoring 1 unit of hunger.
tooltip.relics.warp_drive.description: Allows the relic's wearer to perform controlled body teleportation over short distances.
tooltip.relics.warp_drive.ability.telepo: Teleports the player to a safe spot within a block along the line of sight when used.
tooltip.relics.charm_of_shrinking.descri: Enables the relic's owner to shrink their body, accessing previously unreachable places.
tooltip.relics.charm_of_shrinking.abilit: Temporarily shrinks the player to half size when used. Upon expiration or deactivation, it has a 10-second cooldown.
tooltip.relics.whoopee_cushion.descripti: Mysteriously increases the relic's wearer's flatulence, leading to completely unpredictable consequences.
tooltip.relics.whoopee_cushion.ability.p: With a chance, pushes nearby creatures and inflicts a 10-second nausea effect when taking damage or frequently crouching.
tooltip.relics.kitty_slippers.descriptio: Grants the relic's wearer feline traits, including soft paws and countless lives.
tooltip.relics.kitty_slippers.ability.re: Has a chance to prevent fatal damage, leaving the player with 1 health point.
tooltip.relics.bunny_hoppers.description: Empowers the relic's wearer's legs, allowing stronger jumps off the ground.
tooltip.relics.bunny_hoppers.ability.hol: Allows higher jumps by holding down the jump button.
